name: My Friends (itch)
description:
My Friends is a Magical Realism, short  Horror Visual Novel made for the Narrative Jam #6.

WARNING

This game contains topics not suitable for everyone. +16

---------Instructions----------

Use  Left Mouse Click / Spacebar to go through the dialogues.

Use A/S to select between the 2 options of a question.

-----------------------------------

The game has 4 endings.

Art, Story - Virginia Alicia Velarde Perez.

Coding, timing, assembly - Alejandro Tovar Munoz de Cote.

Translation to English - We did our best. (Non native)

Music by Eric Matyas  www.soundimage.com

--------------------------------------
